issue.title: [C++] Move Executor into a separate header
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10483](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10483). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`Executor` is a general purpose interface but it currently resides in `thread_pool.h` so it can't be used (for example) by `future.h` without introducing a circular dependency. It can probably just reside in `future.h`
